message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that is tailored to meet your specific needs and valued at $1,500,000. I understand its significance to you and am confident it will bring immense value to your endeavors. To ensure we align on the transaction, I am proposing to sell the product to you at a special introductory price of $1,200,000. This offer represents a significant savings of $300,000 compared to the standard valuation, making it an exceptional deal for you. Please let me know if you require any additional information or have questions about the product. I look forward to the possibility of working together.
